body.name: VACASSO Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, Stick Vacuum Cleaners with 28KPA Powerful Suction, Anti-Tangle Handheld Vacuum Cleaner for Home with LED Display for Carpet Hardwood Floor Pet Hair Car Cleaning
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 1 hr 8 mins
features: 🌀28Kpa Suction & Powerful Motor: The VACASSO cordless vacuum cleaner is equipped with a 2024 upgraded brushless motor, which is more energy-saving and has a longer use life. The vacuum cleaner has 2 adjustable speeds, up to 28kpa, which can effortlessly tackle dirt, debris, pet hair, cat litter, dog food and others, suitable for various surface cleaning needs.

🌀Removable Battery & LED Display Screen: The AS2208 cordless stick vacuum cleaner is suitable for all-round house cleaning. It Contains a 6cells*2200mah battery and a max runtime of up to 45 minutes (low suction mode, without Accessories), allowing you to clean the entire house at once. We specially designed button control to to prevent accidental touch of the vacuum cleaner, the clear LED display screen allows you to know the battery level and speed mode in real-time.

🌀5-Layer Filtration and Upgraded V-Shaped Roller Brush: The vacuum cleaners for home use an H13 HEPA filter, and the 5-layer filtration system collects 99.99% of dust particles to 0.1um and outputs pure air from the vacuum cleaner head to prevent secondary pollution. The newly upgraded V-shaped anti-tangle brush effectively reduces hair tangles, easily picks up hair and reduces suction loss.

➤Telescopic Tube, and 180° Rotatable Brush with LED Headlight: The stick vacuum cordless adopts an ergonomic design and has a telescopic metal tube that can customize your most comfortable cleaning height. The handheld vacuum cleaner brush head supports 0° to 180° sideways and the 0° to 90° up and down rotation, makes it easy and free to clean under furniture and in dead corners. The 6 bright LED headlights can illuminate corners, making it easy to trap hidden dark dirt.

➤1L Dust Cup and Care: Cordless vacuum cleaners for home equip a 1.0L large-capacity dust collection box to hold more dust, have a one-button dust removal function, and are equipped with a cleaning brush to the vacuum cleaner. The accompanying package contains the main unit of the vacuum cleaner, an extra filter, a charger, 2 and 1 brush heads, and a crevice brush. If you have any questions about the cordless stick vacuum cleaner, please contact us in time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight vacuum
reviews.reviewText: Love this vacuum its so light weight so easy to assembly and to take apart and clean when your done i use it on my hard wood floors depends on carpet if it to thick doesnt work on it but i use it everyday on my hardwood floors instead of sweeping its light not heavy and its also my favorite color blue but it works well suck up all that dirt and dust off my floors that i have to seeep like 2 to 3 times a day it feels like but definitely recommend if u have hardwood floors or tile just not carpet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: I got this vacuum for everyday vacuuming. Having a bunch of pets I needed something that was cordless, that had good suction and would charge quickly. This vacuum fit the bill! It’s super easy to assemble, charge and use. Even comes with a wall mount! Highly suggest purchasing this vacuum!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ok for the price
reviews.reviewText: Its a good vacuum cleaner for around $100 price and its suction power is good and picks up fine dirt. Its light weight and easy to carry around the home and the accessories make it useful for many different cleaning projects. The headlights are a plus to give clear viability of if the spot needs a rerun or not. Extra filter makes life easy for replacement when time comes. The telescopic pole to extend the height is a nice touch as we can adjust the height according to our liking.Cons are the build quality can be a bit better and when you want to store on the floor, its a bit leaning to the front and can fall over easily and better weight distribution might have helped. There is no access to bruh roll in the front and so need to flip over if anything gets entangled in the brush and you need to remove that.Overall a decent vacuum cleaner to clean small spaces and projects without hassles of carrying heavy vacuum cleaner

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Cordless Vacuum!
reviews.reviewText: I am so pleased with this little vacuum, it has really great suction power for a cordless vacuum, and has been a lifesaver for my photography studio being able to quickly charge it, and not have to worry about plugging it in or dealing with any cords. 10/10!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Love this vacuum. Easy to used . It is lightweight. Cleans up all the dog hair. Would recommend to someone whos looking for a cordless vacuum. i even used it to my ruggable rugs .

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great powerful suction
reviews.reviewText: I'm obsessed with this vaccum it's very light Weight but yet very powerful. Works on carpet and hardwood floors . Super easy to clean . I'll recommend it to anyone who hates heavy vaccums with cords
